content: loop method co 4 sts k to marker 208 sts on needle for body 50 sts on hold for each sleeve body continue knitting in the round until body reaches desired length sample 1 was knit to 10 before blocking after blocking was 12 sample 2 was knit to 39 bust 11 before blocking after blocking was 13 bobble all sts in the following manner to ensure a stretchy edge k1 *k1 insert lhn into the 2 sts on the rhn knit the 2 sts together through the back loop repeat from * until all sts have been bound off sleeves move held sleeve sts to needle starting from the middle of the co underarm sts attach yarn and pick up and knit 2 sts k across the live sleeve sts pick up and k 2 sts next round bobble all sts using the same instructions for the body weave in all ends and block 48 bust ©2023 yarn twisters 3 sisterhood of the travelling shirt
